++ Beasts of the Depths

The Tritons are masters of the depths, and have a wealth of knowledge and talent on dealing with it. 

Kraken - Protectors of [Pumanath], due to the Triton elders and leaders becoming able to commune with them. They ward off the next biggest danger, the dragon turtles.

Dragon Turtles - fierce beasts that attack any traveler they come accross. Thus is why the Tritons are the only people who trade by seafaring vessel due to the Kraken protection.
